document_data.name: Rorik
document_data.mainbody: '''Rorik''' was a merchant traveling along the [[High Road]] between [[Neverwinter]] and [[Luskan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Rorik was stocky, with light brown hair and beard. He invoked [[Waukeen]]'s favor, being a merchant.
document_data.History: Some time around {{Yearlink|1490}}, Rorik joined the merchant's caravan of [[Tollin]] and his crew going from Neverwinter to Luskan, accompanied by members of the [[Order of the Burning Dawn]]. However several members of the caravan's group and missing and the caravan was later attacked by mercenaries, an assault that was set up by the treacherous [[Martumal]].
